explains: v. 克制，抑制（情绪）；镇压，制服

sentences.en: Troops were called in to subdue the rebels.
sentences.cn: 军队被调来镇压反叛者。

sentences.en: Julia had to subdue an urge to stroke his hair.
sentences.cn: 朱莉娅不得不克制住自己，不去抚摩他的头发。

sentences.en: He forced himself to subdue and overcome his fears.
sentences.cn: 他强迫自己克制并战胜他的恐惧。
